abstract: Many users of New York City's bike share program Citi Bike are perturbed by short notice of weekend shutdown to improve service.
lead_paragraph: Citi Bike sent an email to its members around 5 p.m. on Friday, announcing the suspension of service on Saturday and Sunday for maintenance work.

headline.main: With Little Notice, Citi Bike Is Suspended for the Weekend
headline.print_headline: With Little Notice, Citi Bike Is Suspended for the Weekend

snippet: Citi Bike sent an email to its members around 5 p.m. on Friday, announcing the suspension of service on Saturday and Sunday for maintenance work.
